main.textPrint: Founded in 2016, CyberX is the leading prime broker in crypto space specializing in trading execution, market making, OTC and lending

technology.DrivenText: CyberX is a technology driven company. CyberX team is creating a powerful and flexible platform to provide full range of services and products by utilizing latest advancements in blockchain, mathematical modeling, deep learning, financial engineering, and data mining.
technology.Ainfo:
·· Deep Learning - Market’s micro-structure analysis to predict price direction

· Natural Language Processing - Data mining for market and social sentiment monitoring

· Machine Learning - Token white list screening

ourteam.info: Our team consists of veterans from Wall Street banks Goldman Sachs, UBS, Merrill Lynch, top tier funds Citadel, AQR, Blackrock, GSA and Tech leaders Google, Baidu, Thompson Reuters. The founder of CyberX also previously co-founded the first cryptocurrency wallet company in China, Bihang.com in 2013, which was acquired by OKCoin (now known as OKEx).
